name: Free Talk Studio: Mari no Kimamana Oshaberi
overview: Free Talk Studio: Mari no Kimamana Oshaberi (フリートーク・スタジオ ～マリの気ままなおしゃべり～) is a simulation game developed by Digitalware and published by Media Entertainment for the Sega Saturn. There are two versions of the game. The blue cover version comes with three trading cards, while the red cover version comes with a behind the scenes booklet.
